question: Which of the following was the next unit after 'prants' in the administration of Shivaji?
explanation: The provinces under Shivaji administration were known as Prants and were under the charge of the Subedar. There was also a Sarsubedar used to control and supervise the work of the subedar. After Prants the next unit was Tarfs, which were headed by a havaldar.
